au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=8m_L2=3m_central
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(2200,0) # Drive guide to g5 driveGuide(guideConfig.g5) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(42.0, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(42, 0) driveBsz(259.5)
